errors.error_description: Shows usage command without mentioning that twine needs to be installed first
correction_candidates: First install twine with pip install twine, then run the upload command
Install via conda install twine before running upload commands
Use pipx install twine for isolated installation before uploading
Download twine from GitHub releases and install manually before use
errors.golden_answer: First install twine with pip install twine, then run the upload command
